body: In Raising Miro on the Road of Life, "A single mom & son's travel blog & podcast," Lainie writes about their visit to the Palace of the Inquisition in Cartagena, Colombia.
original_body: In Raising Miro on the Road of Life, "A single mom & son's travel blog & podcast," Lainie writes about their visit to the Palace of the Inquisition in Cartagena, Colombia.
title: Colombia: A Trip to a Spanish Inquisition Museum in Cartagena
